page.title: 15FAMILY LIFE.
page.content: Sunday:_ We get up at 9 o'clock and get ready for church, which starts at 10a.m. We have a quick breakfast oftea and toast then we drive to church. Meanwhile Dad has a lie in, takes our dog for a walk and does any odd jobs until we get back about 12.15 p.m. Mum cooks a late breakfast-lunch, bacon, eggs, mushrooms and coffee. We play out in the garden with our friends or relatives, usually Nanna and Grandad. When we go ther we see quite a few people because my Great Grandma lives with them and my Aunt and Uncle and three cousins live next door. We play rounders or play in our den at the bottom of our garden. We have tea with nanna and then come home, have a shower, read a book then go to bed at about 9.00 p.m.
